author: lvxing
content: Hello, what will happen if geth synchronization fails?

author: lvxing
content: <@548344914572869636> Hi, I run https://github.com/jimmygchen/eip4844-devnet on the server and the synchronization keeps failing.

author: lvxing
content: Is there something wrong with the configuration?

author: trimetilo
content: We are running it for blobscan without any issue. Make sure your ports are open and the hard drive is fast enough
